text: Rebecca Thomas (born 17 September 1991) is a South African water polo player. She competed for the South Africa women's national water polo team in the 2015 World Aquatics Championships and 2017 World Aquatics Championships. She played for Marist College's women's water polo team. == References == == Other websites == * 1st-day-of-fina-world-water-polo-championships swimming world Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:South African water polo players
title: Rebecca Thomas
